law.catch_line: A license to engage in business as a dealer authorizes the licensee to store 1.4 G fireworks and 1.3...
law.text: A license to engage in business as a dealer authorizes the licensee to store 1.4 G fireworks and 1.3 G display fireworks at approved locations in storage buildings approved by the State Fire Marshal or the local authority with jurisdiction over local fire prevention codes.
